text: Lehr may refer to: * Lehr (glassmaking), a kiln for annealing glass * Lehr (surname) * Lehr, North Dakota, U.S. * Lehr Infantry Battalion of the Prussian and Imperial German Armies, 1819-1914 * Lehr Infantry Regiment of the German Army in World War I * Lehr-Brigade (mot.) 900, a German Army brigade during World War II * Panzer Lehr Division, a German armored division during World War II * Lehr, a district of Ulm, Germany == See also == * Lahr (disambiguation) * Lehrer, a surname * Lehrs, a surname * Lerner (disambiguation) pt:Lehr
title: Lehr
